channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 27

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Ah. You make a good point. If White had managed an extension somehow, then perhaps Black would be worse off; but clearly that's not what happened. =D Thanks for the input!
item.content:encoded: Ah. You make a good point. If White had managed an extension somehow, then perhaps Black would be worse off; but clearly that’s not what happened. =D Thanks for the input!

item.title: By: Asb
item.dc:creator: Asb
item.description: Well, imo white ended in gote, erased his aji of E18 and has made no extension on the left side, so really there is no punishment except waiting for the moment to strike at his C16 group in my opinion.
item.content:encoded: Well, imo white ended in gote, erased his aji of E18 and has made no extension on the left side, so really there is no punishment except waiting for the moment to strike at his C16 group in my opinion.
